title: Character
description: A character that is present in the game

id.description: Required. Unique identifier for this character.

name.description: Required. The name of the character.

forename.description: Required. First name of the character.

title.description: A title, prefixed to the forename.

race.description: Required. The race that this character was born into.

baseHealth.description: Starting value for the character's health statistic. If not specified, this value will default to the baseFortitude stat.

baseFortitude.description: Required. Starting value for the fortitude stat. This describes the maximum amount of health points the character has.

baseStrength.description: Required. Starting value for the strength stat. This represents the amount of attack power the character has.

baseAvoidance.description: Required. Starting value for the avoidance stat. This represents the amount of defensive power the character has.

baseCharm.description: Starting value for the charm stat. This represents how delightful the character appears to other characters in dialogue. -10 = disliked, 10 = liked

abilityIds.description: List of CombatAbility IDs that the character knows.

equippedIds.description: List of EquipmentItem IDs that the character has equipped. Items listed here will use the slot that the equipment item defines.

factionIds.description: List of Faction IDs that the character is a member.

score.description: Starting score of the faction for the character. If not specified, defaults to Neutral.
